main_definition: occurring or doing something continuously without stopping or interruption

meanings_and_examples.definition: always present in the mind or on one's thoughts
meanings_and_examples.example: She was constantly thinking about her upcoming exam.

meanings_and_examples.definition: occurring frequently or repeatedly over a period of time
meanings_and_examples.example: He is constantly checking his phone for messages from work.

meanings_and_examples.definition: acting in the same way, manner, or with the same intensity without any change
meanings_and_examples.example: The baby was constantly crying throughout the night.

meanings_and_examples.definition: occurring at regular intervals and never stopping
meanings_and_examples.example: She constantly waters her plants every morning before leaving for work.
